newsitem.title: USA: NYSE to seek delisting of Centennial Tech.
newsitem.headline: NYSE to seek delisting of Centennial Tech.

text.p: The New York Stock Exchange said Tuesday it will suspend the trading of Centennial Technologies Inc's common stock on March 3 and will afterwards apply with federal regulators to delist the stock.
The Big Board announced these steps after Centennial disclosed it expects to restate certain financial reports because certain of its financial records appear to have been falsified.
The company's announcement followed the arrest of its former chief financial executive on Friday on alleged charges of insider trading, securities fraud and inventory manipulation.
